an4.240:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.240:1.3: Sabyabajjhena kayakammena, sabyabajjhena vacikammena, sabyabajjhena manokammena, sabyabajjhaya ditthiya—
an4.240:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.240:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an4.240:2.3: Abyabajjhena kayakammena, abyabajjhena vacikammena, abyabajjhena manokammena, abyabajjhaya ditthiya—
an4.240:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
